title: OEM & ODM Custom Solution
metaTitle: Custom Fleet Hardware Solutions | OEM & ODM Services
metaDesc: Tailored hardware design and manufacturing services. We build custom GPS trackers, dashcams, and MDVRs to your specifications.
fullDescription: We provide end-to-end custom hardware development services, from PCB design and mold tooling to firmware customization and logo branding. Contact us to build your own fleet management device.
